name: Pet Trio
description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=broken.studio.pettrio

Psychic Cat?,Telekinesis Pug and Genius Hamster. Use your creativity to solve the simple yet challenging physics puzzle . 90 Amazing normal & mirrored level with a variety of different way to win. Full Version of Pet Trio come with almost 20 customization and option for left hand or right hand play . If have suggestion or anything can send to brokenstudio180@gmail.com . Inspired by similar concept like Box2D, Incredible Machine, Fantastic Contraption, Rube Goldberg, Contraption. Hope you enjoy the game.
